resources.string:
Ebuy is an Internet e-commerce company.
We have 7 years experience in this area,we will provide you with fresh supply of vegetables,fruits,meat,dried food and cooked food.

With the powerful supply chain system and good reputation,we have cooperation with Singapore haidilao,Tanyu nearly hundreds of restaurants.
 
Ebuy is commited to satisfying consumers demand for shopping experience in quality food,providing consumers with good quality groceries and improving after-sales service. Ebuy is trying to become an online fresh grocery store that more and more consumers are trusted.Over the past few years, with the customers support,Ebuy has succesfully built a high-quality corporate image with high reputation and brand characteristics.
 
We will continue to strictly control food quality and provide consumers healthier,safer, more nutritious and more assured food.We are trying to get Singaporeans to enjoy the freshest and cheapest fresh food.
